channel.title: lost all my cats :(
channel.description:
![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
first one to go was the baby : he got hit by a car and survived but he got paralyzed so I took him to the vet to take him down.
a month later "now" his parents went missing for 10 days and I kept looking for them everyday, and I found them yesterday...or what's left of them, and apparently they died by being run over by cars. entire family just...gone :frowning:

item.title: lost all my cats :(
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
I don’t even know where to start. Shadi, I’m sorry for your loss, and I personally can say I know how impossible it is to keep a cat indoors once it’s been outside even once.

ITT: BMS members proving they’re not ALL insensitive pricks, and mods serving justice. Makes my heart warm

item.description:
FP has posted a few pictures, but that was before the avatar/attitude change.

Shouldn’t one of the mods or admins be able to see if FP’s IP address has changed? I don’t know how vBulletin does it, but most other forum packages seem to log the IP address of every post everyone makes.

item.title: lost all my cats :(
item.dc:creator: gugamilare
item.description:
Yeah, I remember Shasta, I even had put him in my ignore list long before he was banned. Now he must have gotten his way back into BM forums using Fancy Pants’ account. He, or Danny Smith, or Swamp Fox…

Now, I remember some stuff Fancy Pants posted in the thread “Ask a girl”. I used to like her opinion. Since she changed her avatar, she doesn’t look the same anymore.

I’m with Catz, I think (or just hope) her account was hijacked.

One minute of silence for the real Fancy Pants

Read full topic

item.title: lost all my cats :(
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

I thought she was a valuable asset to the community. Every conversation topic needs an advocate.

Sure, I agree with you there. But does a vast majority of said advocate’s posts have to be malignant and hostile towards other forum members? No, we don’t have to put up with that shit.

Read full topic

item.title: lost all my cats :(
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
(rot)(fodder:

Not in the slightest. I Lol’d cause it thought “girl” was a get out of banned free card. No luck with that one, dear.

I don’t care if you’re a girl or the queen of England , if every single post that you make has a nasty, arrogant, hostile and spiteful tone then I don’t want you posting on these forums. If you look through Fancy’s post history you’ll see that nearly every one of her posts meet this criteria. It’s like she’s on the fucking rag 24/7 or something. But to come in here and be a totally insensitive twat towards someone who just lost all their pets, whether it was directly or indirectly his fault, is just unacceptable.

Read full topic

item.title: lost all my cats :(
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
Steppenwolf:

Are you actually comparing someone’s mother with an animal?

So an animal’s life isn’t a life? To Chinese, every life is fair and no one is lower but no much people can understand it.

Good day, sir. I don’t want to restart the history again.

Read full topic
